definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be at rest, repose (prob. = Ar. raja9a return, prop. return to rest, after wanderings, etc.);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: imv. 2 fs. Je 47:6 (of sword) be gathered into thy scabbard, [[הֵרָֽגְעִי]] [[וָדׂ֫מִּי]] repose, and be still.

definitions.title: Hiph. a.
definitions.body: trans. give rest to;—Inf. cstr. Je 31:2 [[הָלוֹךְ לְהַרְגִּיעוֹ]] I will go to give him (Isr.) rest, Je 50:34 [[לְמַעַן הִרְגִּיעַ אח־האדץ]] (on ´[[הִ]]:, v. Ges:§ 531 Dr:De 7:24; read prob. ´[[הַ]]:); Is 51:4 [[ומשׁפטי לאור עמים אַרְגִּיעַ]] usu. I will cause my judgment (religion) to repose as, etc. (i.e. I will establish it; cf. [[שִׂים]] Is 42:4); but metaph. strange: hence Bachm Che Marti (joining to v:Is 42:5) [[חִדְקִי]] (< [[אֲקָרֵב ]] Is 46:13) [[אַרְגִּיעַ אַקְרִיב]] in a moment (I. [[רָגַע]] Hiph.) will I bring near, etc., Du [[הִרְגִּיעַ]] [[קָרֵב]], Oort Ry Kit [[בְּרֶנַע קָרֵב]] (cf. LXX e)ggi/zei taxu/).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: intrans. rest, repose, De 28:65 [[ובגויס ההם לא]] [[הַרְגִּיעַ]], Is 34:14 [[שָׁם הִרְגִּ֫יעָה לִילִית]]. So Sir 36:31.
